Name: Higgs Boson: Timed Puzzle
About the game: Higgs Boson: Timed Puzzle is a short and challenging experience where the player must rotate pieces considering the time limit to assemble a particle accelerator. Rotate the pieces to form a geometric shape and make the particles collide with each other; Featuring: 30+ levels; Relaxing soundtrack; Time limit that makes the game challenging; Hurry up! Be quick and sharp!
